content.detailedDescription: Sunday aproximatly 9:30 pm stepped out of car when orange red light caought my eyes at first thought it was a helicopter but no noise,was also to low for anything else, watched it pass tree then disappear. called friend to tell her about 3 to 5 minutes later a second light appeared and followed same direction as first again disappeared after passing a hugh tree in my sight. ran in the house to get camera knowing they travel in threes a third appeared from same direction also follwed same path as others. pictures did not come out good but will send, also put in flight path on day light veiw
content.summary: Orange red oval caught my eyes

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and two other family members were walking our dogs down lakeside drive in north east, pennsylvania (a town just northeast of erie, pa) at around 10:00pm near our home when we saw an orange orb traveling over lake erie, less than a quarter-mile from the beach which is located down the lake bank  that runs parallel to the street (the bank drops about 30 feet to the beach below).  the orb traveled west to east across the lake and it was flying low at around 200 feet. it was a solid orange glow, similar to a flare but not pulsating and there was no trail or sparks behind it. there was a single blinking white light at the rear of the object but no visible wings or any other lights that one would see on a plane. it traveled in a slow arc across the lake and we moved to the edge of the lake bank to get a closer look. the sky was growing dark but was not pitch black in the area we were looking because the sun sets direct over the lake, in the horizon in the direction of canada.
	30 seconds later we saw another orange orb of the exact same appearance (orange orb with a blinking white light in the rear) move in the same flight pattern behind the previous object. when it moved across our field of vision, we lost sight of the first object behind some trees along the lake bank. the second object also soon disappeared behind these same trees from our field of vision. 
30 seconds after this second object disappeared, two orange orbs appeared, one following the other in the same direction, travelling west to east. both objects stopped and hovered over the water. the one in front suddenly lost its orange glow but a solid object remained silhouetted against the sky and changed directions northward in the direction of canada. during this time, the object in the rear slowly descended to the water below. it landed on the water and stayed there for 10 seconds before the orange glow suddenly darkened and there object sank into the water, leaving ripples behind that were visible by the faint bit of moonlight across the lake. 
two men in a truck pulled up near our road after the objects were out of our sight and told us they were looking for a way to view a lightweight air craft that they were told was being launched over the lake. i believed at the time that they must have heard something on a police scanner about some sort of demonstration over the lake but i have yet to hear anything in the erie times or on the news. after about 10 minutes we saw fire trucks  and police cars heading in the direction of orchard beach park, in the direction from where the objects originated in our field of vision. we also saw a coast guard vessel and two police boats searching the water where the last orb sank. after using search lights they eventually stopped and focused on one area, the same area where we saw the object sink. so far no one else has reported this sighting to my knowledge.
content.summary: Four orange orbs over lake erie near north east, pa

content.detailedDescription:
About 5 minutes after 10 pm, hm the dog outside but came right back in and called for me (mg) to come look at something in the sky. it was a ufo. then there was a second one, and then a third one.

after i saw the first one, i ran back in the house and got my mobile phone and came back outside and took one short video and one photo. i knew the resolution would be nothing like seeing it in person and it was also after the ufos had already become much smaller, too. hm got his camera which is much higher resolution than my phone camera and took three videos. but again, this was already after the ufos were smaller than they first appeared.

the ufos looked like hot air balloons might look with bright, flame-like, flickering, intensely red lights in the center, but they did not move like hot air balloons would move. the clouds were moving slowly toward the ocean (south/southeast), but these ufos were not moving that direction. the first one moved quickly inland and became blurry and larger and dimmer as it went, and moved faster and faster. before the first one disappeared, the second one appeared and it was very bright and red and flickering like fire in the center. it was up really high, like they all were, and it also moved inland and became smaller and smaller and disappeared. the third one appeared, all bright and red and flickering and distinct, but it soon started moving up higher and moving away and it also became smaller and disappeared upwards and to the south/southwest.

after all this we were still looking at the sky to see if there would be any more of them when there was a "shooting star," meteorite, or whatever. (also, we moved to this location only a month ago so we don't know how rare this is, but 9 hours before this happened, the power went out here for 30 minutes. the next door neighbor, who has lived here a long time, told me that never happens here, but other neighbors doubt her memory, so i don't know which is it, but the power company reported the outage affected from 100 to 300 houses. additionally, about a week previous, a fighter jet strafed this location. it was extremely low and extremely fast and extremely loud, so much so that the locals came out to see what was going on. it was very unusual. aircraft are lot allowed to fly that fast and that low in populated areas. it was very strange.)

the ufos looked the way hot air balloons would look, but they also looked like flares attached to balloons or parachutes would look, except for the fact that they moved contrary to the wind direction.

the next morning i called the local air national guard and coast guard. i asked them if they might know what these ufos were and if there were any military aircraft exercises the previous night. all i got from them was an instant, "no, no, no sir, we don't know what that is, we haven't had any reports of that, there weren't any military exercises last night." neither of them wanted to talk about it or suggest any possibilities for what the ufos might have been.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three ufos in galveston tx at 10 pm on june 30, 2013

content.detailedDescription:
My husband put the dogs out last night at 10.45 pm last port of call for the dogs before bed, 
my husband walked round the back garden with them and he looked up and saw this huge white glowing light coming over the bungalow about as high as a private plane, it was traveling at a steady speed no noise whatsoever coming from it, it looked like a massive planet except it was moving,
husband came quickly in doors and rushed into the conservatory to get his binoculars and shouted to me come and have a look at this ,well i can honestly say that i have never seen anything like it, it was so bright it was heading for the southeast ,as it moved further behind the trees out the front way where the big oak tree stands just outside the drive way , i went into the lounge to have a look out of that window and it was heading for the sea veering off to the south. 
my husband put the dogs out at 10.45 pm last port of call for the dogs before bed, 
husband walked round the back garden with them when  he caught site  of  this huge white glowing light coming over the bungalow about as high as a private plane, it was traveling at a steady speed no noise whatsoever coming from it, it looked like a massive planet except it was moving,
my husband came quickly in doors and rushed into the conservatory to get his binoculars and shouted to me come and have a look at this ,well i can honestly say that i have never seen anything like it, it was so bright it was heading for the southeast ,as it moved further behind the trees out the front way where the big oak tree stands just outside the drive way , i went into the lounge to have a look out of that window and it was heading for the sea veering off to the south. 
i emailed the local air base in norfolk to let them know what we had seen and hopefully we might get a reply. it was not a plane as it had no navigation lights just a very intense white glow we would have heard an engine if it had one, you can hear a pin drop out here at night as it���s so quiet. 
we just thought this is a ufo, we were quite taken back by this, it actually made us feel very uneasy, it never made any noise, and was so bright that we couldn���t see any shape only that it look like a ball of light about the size of a tea plate, my husband has worked for the oil companies for 45 years onshore and offshore in construction work and is very well thought of in his job and is now an inspector. he would have known if this ufo object was anything manmade that we know of that fly in our sky���s;
content.summary: Very intense bright light coming over

content.detailedDescription:
Outside having a smoke on our patio overlooking lake nipissing around 11pm with my boyfriend. we first noticed one right away coming from south east basically flying over the visible scorpio constellation, with the milky way ribbon just left of where the first seemed to originate.

this particular orb was relatively starlike in shape and size, speed was variable as it seemed to speed up and slow down at various intervals. the path curved from the south east to the north west. 

shortly after the first one we noticed there was a second one that flew in nearly the same flight path just a few degrees beneath the first ones path, but same movement, same direction, and same origin.

we were both in awe at those two when we got the idea that we should grab our laser pointer to see if there could be any communication contact made.

once that was retrieved we noticed another starlike orb clipping along the night sky in the same general area but instead moving east to west (almost exactly). my boyfriend then flashed the laser pointer at it in quick but steady flashes. instead of that orb responding one to the west about 40 degrees from the western horizon did.

the responding orb was unnoticed  until it flashed and grew in apparent size that i could only relate to the size of a normal full moon, and at least doubled it's brightness. i personally saw more of the flash then my boyfriend but it would have lasted at least a couple of seconds from beginning to end. once the brightness was over you could see the orb move away and disappear.

at once, i had an intense feeling of excitement mixed with a feeling that we shouldn't be flashing them. i felt like we had done something unacceptable and was for a moment scared. not sure if i felt that way because we got a response or because i fear government retaliation.

after seeing that orb,another one appeared to be heading the opposite direction to the one we laser pointed, but roughly the same location in the sky. this one followed/crossed paths with a airplane that was coming from the south to north east at nearly the same time.

we have been diligent in checking for satellites, iridium flares, iss, meteor showers and even fireworks (canada day celebrations) and couldn't come up with our own answers to what happened.

as always we have an intense sense of awe, wonder, confusion, and sometimes a little fear. we have accepted that at least half of what we see aren't anything we personally know of. but would love to know if anyone else saw anything last night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Multiple starlike ufos with one large flash

content.detailedDescription: While outside smoking a cigarette in north houston, i noticed a really bright blinking white star like object moving very fast, going towards southwest houston. the light was blinking on/ off with a long pause in between. the object seemed to be pulsating. this was not an aircraft, nor a meteorite.
content.summary: White star-like object moving rapidly, would blink on/off with long pauses. object was heading southwest.

content.detailedDescription: I was conducting a training exercise when i saw the object.  i was laying down on the ground i noticed the stars were out very bright and then saw the moving object among the stars.  it was witnessed as a star like object moving in a quick motion and a race track formation.  after 2 track formation movements the light stopped and disappeared.  approximately 5 minutes later it appeared again and completed a race track formation again and disappeared more quickly that the first time.  total time was approximately 10 minutes for the event.  it did not appear again during that evening. i was not scared but curious.  i have since been staring at the sky waiting to see it again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: [flg] star like light moving quickly in a race track formation then stopped and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was getting off of the mechanicsburg exit off of route 81 s when i saw directly ahead on the horizon 10 or so red/orange glowing lights hovering in the sky. they were in an odd pattern, almost looked like the big dipper, sort of like an arch, but in a weird pattern. they didn't appear to be moving, they didn't seem to be connected to each other. there were no light towers or airplanes. i stared at them while sitting at the stop light wondering what the heck they were, then continued down the road. i decided to turn back to try to get a picture, and when i came back 2-5 minutes later there was only one light left and it was on the opposite side of the highway, more above than towards the horizon.
content.summary: 10 or so red-orange lights in the sky, hovering, aranged sort of like big dipper in that they were almost in an arc shape, came back down the road a few minutes later and only one light was left, on the opposite side of the highway almost directly above.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving to get ice cream, but we could not drive on our usual route because it required crossing the train tracks. there was a train stalled on the tracks for a number of hours, and there was no sign of it being repaired. so, onward we went, through some back roads to get to price chopper for ice cream. 
i first noticed what i thought was a red star, but then i noticed that it was moving. to my surprise, i noticed that the alleged star was moving, and moving towards our car. the red-orange light was moving smoothly towards us from the north. it was flying noiselessly and slowly turning southwest. as it was passing overhead, we noticed its wedge shape, similar in shape to a slightly rounded isosceles triangle. 
we stopped in the middle of an intersection to watch it as it flew over us. nobody else was on the street. my girlfriend felt unnerved by its silence. i felt excited by the sighting, and wanted to follow it, but as it got closer, i felt a little unnerved as well. 
we turned east to continue on our errand, and then we turned south. as we turned south, we spotted the object again, flying over the treeline. the object was moving in the same direction that we were traveling. we lost sight of it under the treeline.
we looked for the object in the sky in the parking lot of price chopper, but did not see anything.
content.summary: It was hovering/flying in the general direction of a train that has been stalled on tracks for a few hours.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, and i were outside on our deck having a cigarette, i often look at the sky, and when i looked up, i saw what looked like a slowly moving, bright star. it was moving in a straight line after watching it for about 30 seconds, it disapeared. there is not a cloud in the sky. my wife then says "look theres another one." i looked and saw it, traveling in the opposite direction of the first one. the second one travelled across the aky in a straight line, till it went out of site over mount timpanogas. at this time my wife pointed out a third one, that also disapeared in the middle of the sky, then a fourth, and a fifth, that disapeared also.Upon seeing these lights, i was excited.
content.summary: Seen a starlike object traveling across the sky, it disapeared after aprox 30 seconds. saw 4 more.

content.detailedDescription: We were out on porch having a cigarette, i was looking up in the sky and shouted to my husband did you see that he said no, i thought it might have been shooting star but it came out of nowhere and materalized out of nowhere went straight across for about 2 secs and disappeared.  then about 40 secs later another one appeared a little smaller or could be possible it was the same one, but it just materialized and was closer to us and then dissapeared again. he and i saw the second one at the same time. we lost sight cause it just disappeared.
content.summary: Strange

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out some recycling between 10:00-10:30 at night.  i noticed what looked like a burning ember from a firework in the sky over the houses directly south of my house.  however, instead of falling towards the earth, it was moving parallel to the ground and traveling slowly above our neighborhood from w to e. i watched it for 2-3 minutes - even called someone out of the house to watch it, too. it slowly ascended into the clouds as it continued traveling e.  this surprised me as it i thought it was closer to the ground, but apparently it was closer to cloud level (maybe it was bigger than i thought...?).  i eventually i lost it in the clouds to the east of my house.  i could hear no sound as i observed it.
content.summary: Small, glowing, red-orange object slowly traveled parallel to the ground without sound and ascended into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: During a thunderstorm to the east of our home in the foothills west of denver, we observed 4-6  circular lights moving at a rapid speed and randomly changing direction continually over a 20-30 minute period. these lights were well above the lightning and clouds associated with the thunderstorm and light movements did not seem to be associated in any way with  the lighting strikes below.
content.summary: 4-6 rapidly moving white circular white lights rapidly changing direction

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:30 pm on 6/30/13. m y wife and i we at our cottage on the rappahanck river.My wife was outside and called me to look at a strange light in the sky. the light was behind a tree when i went outside and did not see it until it can from behind the tree. the light was a reddish orange and made no sound.It appeared to be no more than 600 feet above the ground. we watched it move in a straight line to the northeast.The light was just as bright going as coming and was moving about 50 mph.
content.summary: Very bright redish-orange orb moving smlowly and making no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Time was 8:38 pm, my daughter (15) and i were outside playing badmitton.  we always wait to go out until later because of the heat.  it was a clear cloudless day.  we had reported another ufo in same area and same flight path back in april on here.  well, once again moving slowly, almost as if floating but with a path of constant movement i said to my daughter, look there is that object again.  i told her i want to see this close up and ran into the house for binoculars (thats all i have to magnify it).  so when i came back out my daughter had come up onto our back deck and said in an excited voice, look there are two of them.  well the first one that caught my attention was moving from se to nw.  this other object was moving from nw to se, they did pass by each other rather close and i thought they might collide, of course they didnt.  neither one of them made a sound.  so i held up my binoculars, and first observed the 1st object, moving from se to nw, it was long and white with a black pointed tip, and no observable wings.  then i looked at the other object moving from nw to se and it was triangular silver shiney, no wings.  i had my daughter observe them as well and she saw what i had seen as she described them out loud to me.  but the rocket one she said had what appeared to be flames coming from the back of it.  i took another look and sure enough there were orange yellow, what appeared to be flames, but they were not flowing like flames.  more a steady light source.  

well, my daughter had turned on her cell phone camera, and said look mom i can not even see these objects in my phone.  all you could see was blue sky.  she kept trying to capture one of them but they never showed up on her camera.

this is the second time we have had this kind of thing happen, in our april report we actually did see aliens in the trees and an oragne light and felt rain on a cloudless clear evening.  there is something going on here that i can not figure out.  i would love sonme answers,but i suppose we all would on all these cases reported.  

i have reported several things to mufon, you know what they are all in the same location.  in our yard i mean.  out back.
content.summary: Playing badmitton with 15 year old daughter observed what we thought was same object we observed in april, this time there were two objects

content.detailedDescription:
June 30, 2013
i live on the flight path to bush intercontinental airport (iah).  i was sleeping & i woke up to the sound of a jet coming in for a landing.  it was unusual because they usually don't have a lot of planes coming from that direction after about midnight or 1am & i knew it was later than that because i went to bed a little after 1am.

i could see a bright light shining through my shades. (i have matchstick shades w/ a canvas backing.  they are for privacy, not light blocking) and i remember thinking, "the moon is really bright tonight."  i was laying there trying to go back to sleep when i saw the light slowly move from the right side of my window to the left side.  and i thought, "the moon can't move like that." and i sat up & watched the light slowly move back to the right & as it was moving i noticed that the light appeared to be shimmering.  i opened the shade to get a better view of the sky & the light wasn't the moon.  the moon was peeking out from behind a cloud & it was a half moon & an orange color.  the light i was seeing was bright white, oval/football shaped and under the clouds.  it was a shimmering light, like the way sunlight plays on the surface of choppy water, except this was in the sky. there were faint rainbows at the edges of the light and it was just moving back & forth across the sky.  i kept thinking, "am i really seeing this.  am i dreaming? is this real?  what is it?"  i looked away, rubbed my eyes to make sure i was awake, & looked back & it was still there.  and then i thought, "oh my god, where's my phone."  i ran to get my phone to film it & when i got back it was gone.

i was facing east, it was about 45 degrees above the horizon.  the moon was above the clouds & about the size of a nickel.  the light was below the clouds & about the shape of a football but the size of a tennis ball maybe a little bigger.  i checked the time when it was all over & the clock read 3:17 am.  i checked iah's website & they had qatar airways 6075 from atlanta land at 3:30 am & that was the only plane that came in at that time & it was late it had been delayed 80 min in atlanta.

i have no idea what it was. i would expect it to be explained as some sort of astronomical phenomenon like aurora borealis or ball lightening.
content.summary: White shimmering light in eastern sky about 3:12 to 3:17 am june 30, 2013

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 0040 on 30jun2013, i stepped exited my house and stood on the back porch to have one last cigarette before bed.  the street where my house sits runs directly north-south.  probably 90% of all streets in the smaller utah cities run either directly north-south or directly east-west.  the back of my home faces directly 270 degrees west.  while smoking, i was looking up at the stars, and enjoying a beautiful clear view of the sky.  one star, situated at about 70 degrees elevation, at 270 degrees west, suddenly increased 10x (times) in both brightness and intensity. the star flashed brightly for one, may two seconds, then simply disappeared.  the star was not in the middle of any clouds, and i remained outside, studying the stars for another 10 minutes, searching for any aircraft or anything that could explain what i had just witnessed.  i live near both an air force base and an international airport.  i am retired military, so i know what airplane lights look like.  while searching the sky, i saw no other aircraft, no other odd lights, no moving lights or stars (such as a satellite or high flying aircraft), i saw no blue or red lights which would normally accompany the wings of an aircraft that would have been either arriving or leaving any of the nearby airports.  since the 4th of july holiday is near, no base ops have been ongoing for the last few days, meaning, i have not heard any f-16's, a-10's, or c-130's for a few days now, which rules out what i saw being any nearby military aircraft.  since it was the 29th and 30th of the month, no air reserve ops were ongoing.  i have seen some strange things in the western sky at night in the past, more specifically on a heading of 210 degrees from my back porch, which would take my line of sight directly towards the dugway army test range and test center.
content.summary: Brightness and intensity of star increased ten-fold, then vanished

content.detailedDescription: It was just before 3:30 in the morning when my friends and i were in my back yard. i had just mentioned to them that it seemed unusually bright out for the time of night that it was. we heard a loud boom that seemed like it was coming from the south (our left). it sounded like an m-80 went off, or something bigger. we looked to the north (out right) and saw a big flash of light from behind a tree. immediately after the flash something that looked like a reddish-orange fireball appeared from behind the tree (from our vantage point) and began to move through the sky above us. it did not fit any description of any aircraft we've ever seen or know of. it didn't keep a straight path, but would zig and zag, while still moving in the general direction of going south. it even stopped and hovered in the sky at one point. while our eyes were transfixed on the hovering orb-like object, a second object with the same appearance came out from the same area as the first one. when that happened the first object continued moving south. a third object (with the same appearance) then appeared and joined the second object. they "flew" close together while the first object continued moving south and disappeared into the clouds. the remaining two then began moving in that direction, still with a zig-zag pattern and periodically stopping, until they too disappeared into the clouds. the entire experience was only a few minutes. the objects made no noise while they were in the sky. the only noise we heard was the initial boom sound. we were all in awe of what we'd seen and waited a bit longer to see if the objects would re-appear, but we didn't see them again after that.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 reddish orange objects flying through the sky, appearing one at a time and leaving one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: I was in new york on a trip with a group of people i know. we had bought tickets for a double decker bus tour around the city on june 5th. it was evening time around 5:00-7:00. we were on the bus tour and we were taking pictures. i had taken pictures of the new york times building. i never went through the pictures until today june 30th, 2013. i was looking through the pictures and saw a dark blimp like structure in the sky next to the new york times building. i never auctually saw it in real life but it showed up in my pictures.
content.summary: A blimp-like structure

content.detailedDescription: The object was spotted at 11pm flying from the southeast toward the north in front of my yard by several of my friends. i noticed there was no sound, and the object appeared to travel a straight flight path and was flying low - 500 ft to 1000 ft, had 3-4 orange lights (connected) and not blinking. the shape was irregular - not a disc, not a triangle. the encounter lasted 2-3 minutes. my photo was taken on my iphone - and we had a great ground to air visual moments before taking the photo. lost sight as the object continued to fly north.....All of us had seen the same thing and none of us was sure what to make of it.
content.summary: Ufo over robesonia pa

content.detailedDescription: Last night at 9:20pm me and six other adults and 4 children were on my raised deck in my back yard we were watching the fire works from wheat field after the grand finally we were getting ready to head in the house my sister said what kind of plane is that all of us looked up and saw a craft coming toward us from the north with blue lights pulsating in circles and changing shape then another one came and that point i ran and got my iphone startied video after the third craft came over i went and grab my wife's camera it's about 2 minutes into the sighting all 4 of the kids are crying my brother in law are trying to figure out what's going and our wife's are getting mad at us and say we're scaring the kids we watched about 7craft all together i heard no noise thee intire time this and prior to the fire works there was a sheriff helicopter in the air to close the air space for the fire works so we watched the craft fly until they were ubscured by a hill and some trees
content.summary: Triangle shape with 3 circles that would go from in a row and change to the shape of the triangle and there were about 7 craft coming one after thee other heading south down the i 215

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on our patio in evening, facing north (lake erie) an orange globe came up from the lake heading south right over my home.  no sound.  i knew at once what it was.  later read that it landed on our peninsula.
what a thrill.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: Four ufo's seen in night sky on june 29th at 12:40am.  no spotlight, no trace light coming from the ground.  all four did not have a color.  looked to appear to be white in hue.  four sphere/circle shaped flying object made no noise.  no airplanes were in the sky at the time.  four ufos were in unison.  objects spun around in a circular motion, not fast rather at normal speed.  the beat was 1,2,3, hit(on the hit they would all collide and bounce out).  after about 5 min. one of the four objects separated from the rest to the upper left out of sync with the others it hovered by itself while the other three continued the cycle.  it then joined back up with the other 3 objects, to make four and then over some time the objects faded away.  they did not fly away they just eventually disappeared. maybe 4 min. later a plane appeared in the sky but i am close to an airport, which is really funny because during the time there were no planes in the sky at all.  very strange definitely witnessed the ufo and i was not alone as a friend was with me and witnessed it too.
content.summary: Four ufo objects in sky

content.detailedDescription:
On a night in the mid autumn of 1996, in my hometown of rushden, in the english county of northamptonshire, at the age of 10 years old; i saw something which was so enigmatic, it captured all my curiosity as a child and changed me forever. the town of rushden in northampton lies to the east of the county in a small valley with a population of around 37,000 and is generally a quiet town, known historically for its shoe making factories.

at that time, the family home was a semi-detached house with an enclosed garden facing a row of semi-detached houses on the opposite side. as a child, i enjoyed playing in the garden of my family home in the afternoons during the weekends and during the weekdays after middle school in my bedroom. one particular day while in the garden i remembered looking once at the sky as the sun came out behind the clouds and as i did, i saw a glinting light below and to the far right (east) of the sun, against the south facing sky. it was a thin pencil shape with its ends tapered, set at a 45 degree angle with a reddish trace. it sat still in the sky and appeared to be rather high. after looking at it for about 10 or so seconds i continued playing with my toys, thinking little of it.

a few days later while riding my bike up and down the garden, the sky was clear and i could once again see the same strange shape in the sky, however this time it was in a different position in the sky, to the west with a greenish trace. it glinted every so often and again i took my attention away after a short period of time. in the second week after school, i was playing in my room and as i moved to the window to place toy cars, i glanced out the window. the room was south facing, at the back of the house with the garden below. as i looked, high in the sky above the jutting chimney tops of the opposite row of houses; i saw an oval shape with a reddish glow, which appeared to tumble in slow motion, but stay in position. the most memorable aspect of the third sighting was that it was much closer and larger than the previous two and naturally as i became curious about the strange shapes and colours, i told my mother about the object in the sky.

my mother said humorously that it was a plane as many planes fly over the town. the area is known for its many flight corridors for commercial airlines. that was the only time i saw the shape with colours which was then the second week of sightings. the last and most frightening sighting happened the week after and interestingly, it didn���t occur during the day. on the night of the last sighting i was told to go to bed as it was late and so i made my way upstairs to my bedroom. as i did so, i remembered that i had needed to close the curtains as i had left them open for two nights in contrast to closing them every night. i passed the landing, switched the light on and entered my bedroom, not closing the door behind me immediately; i turned left to proceed to the window.

i made not three steps into the room until i froze out of fear. in the sky outside my window, above the house opposite our home, about 100 feet away, was a large object; which i later understood might have been a vehicle of some type. the craft was oval-shaped about the diameter of the two semi-detached houses together, with a bright red set of revolving chevrons which travelled in a clockwise direction from right to left. the chevrons disappeared for about a second and returned as what i can only assume; it made its way around its perimeter. the craft itself appeared dark, while being surrounded in a bright orange glow with a fiery yellow top. the yellow oval top had a shadowy figure, but no detail could be seen. the craft was motionless with only its chevrons revolving; it made no sound and i felt no heat. i was frozen still in fear and observed the craft for about five seconds; until my fear turned to hysteria, running out of the room and down stairs to tell my parents.

i told my parents about what i had seen and they laughed thinking that it was a joke of sorts. as they demanded i now go to bed, i refused, adamant not to venture back upstairs. my mother and step-father stunned at my out of character refusal and clearly moved by my distress, they ventured up stairs to find out what it was that i had seen. after a while, my father called me back up to my room and so anxiously i climbed the stairs. my mother waiting at my bedroom door said that there was nothing to worry about and as i entered my room my step-father said, ���look, (gesturing at the window) there is nothing there���.

it had been quickly decided by my parents, that i had seen nothing and assumed it was my imagination. i did not sleep well that night and over that year, made it a ritual to close my curtains out of fear that what i had seen would return. it came to be the most frightening thing i have seen, yet held my curiosity. at the time as a child, i did not know anything about flying saucers, ufos, aliens and other folk law. as a first-hand observer of the phenomenon, i feel a strange sense of obligation to share with others what i feel is a real and important phenomenon. however, for fear of ridicule only my family has known about it until now. i am certain i saw something unusual, it could have been a vehicle, but the mystery remains as to exactly what it was. when you do see the phenomenon, which is so out of context with reality, it changes you forever and that was my childhood experience.
content.summary: Three daylight sightings of great distance and height of various colours and mainly two forms. followed by a close night sighting above subjects house: object appeared oval, dark surface, exhibiting bright red chevrons, orange glow, occupant shadow.

content.detailedDescription: My daughters and i were sitting on my front porch around 9pm, when we saw a brilliant red ,yellow and orange light appear toward the west of us as it got closer to us, it turned a greenish-yellow and shot straight up into the sky.
content.summary: On june 29th my daughters and i witnessed what was in all terms a ufo...

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching tv, the bright light out of the window,right away i knew it was different, i live by airfoce guard base. i see jets,plus by airport see them all the time never that low never without strobe or any other light except what appeared to be a orange flame behind it, but it wasn't fire it was dead silent and low and from even inside my house the jets are loud i was outside helicopter from hospital flys over a lot wasn't a helicopter. looked cigar shaped but could have been round couldn't tell from my angle. moving pretty slow very low, was moving from north to the south, then it abruptly changed course almost 180 degrees then took off lost vision of it after that about a 30 or 40 second sighting! pure adrenaline in amazement my mom was frightened. when it changed course and took off almost heading in the direction it came from!
content.summary: I

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my chair watching tv in the living room around 1:25am.  something told me to look out the window of my deck door which i had open.  just as i did, i saw a bright green light fly over my apartment building.  it was a round shape and the color of it was the same as a green light on a traffic light.  it made no sound but was flying very,very fast!  it also seemed to be descending.  i have never seen anything like it bjpefore, and after it passed i just laid there for awhile not knowing what to think.  i forgot to mention that i lost sight of it when it flew over another apartment building across the street.
content.summary: I saw a bright green light fly over my apartment building.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
As i was star gazing at 3 or 4 am i saw one object straight up above me with dual exhaust and it resembled a jet then another came it looked like an oval  
with no exhaust and third looked like a ufo but it had little exhaust they didn't make a loud noise it was more like a hum and one went in a completely different direction towards the sun the others went in a straight line
content.summary: 3 objects first looked like jet second oval third triangle

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home and noticed a plane low over the rooftops. not unusual because mccarren airport is nearby. pulled into apartment parking lot and thought why is this plane not out of sight it is moving too slow. then i realised it wasn't moving forward at all. it was hovering over the complex. it looked like suspended in time or frozen in place but i could still hear the engine. sounded like a normal plane. so i just stopped driving in the middle of the parking lot and a few seconds later it started to move forward again at normal speed. i parked my car real fast and walked back around the building and it was gone! i have a clear view all the way to the strip but it was just vanished within 30 seconds..
content.summary: Thought it was a plane but realized it was hovering over the building

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette before bed when i looked up at the sky and noticed a strange round ball of light that traced across the sky in a weird pattern faster than any airplane or usual light. this was also encountered by several people in my area as i discovered via facebook.
content.summary: A round ball of light that traced across the sky faster than any airplane or usual light (star)
